entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Parry Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:40 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Temperature: -6.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 85 %
Dewpoint: -8.5°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries and snow squalls. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning and early in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
